author: Ivan Mehta
title: Daily Distraction: Become a shutterbug from the comfort your couch
description: One of the perks of writing about tech is to get to know more about photography with different phones. I miss the time when I could go outside and spend a couple of hours in a public park or by a monument to take some snaps. Last year, when I went on a ‘EuroT…
content:
One of the perks of writing about tech is to get to know more about photography with different phones. I miss the time when I could go outside and spend a couple of hours in a public park or by a monument to take some snaps.
Last year, when I went on a EuroT… [+1028 chars]
